resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

My name is Leye, although some people call me Monsur. 
I am an Android Developer, Java/Kotlin. 
I like to say that "I am a lover of chess and something else." But I love to code; it makes me feel ecstatic. 
I am an Oracle Certified Java SE 11 Developer.
